about_the_game:
EXPLORE THE HIDDEN WORLD

Delve into the world of hidden mysteries and arcane forces as you master your own understanding of Mana and the forces that secretly shape reality.

CULTIVATE ALLIES

Forge alliances, friends, and rivalries. You might even commit yourself in a Pact with some ancient being as a source of power in return for some sacrifice.

EXPAND YOUR BASE OF POWER

After leaving the University, find a home location and create your sanctuary. Or wander the earth as a nomad mage, relying on your own cunning, the kindness of strangers, and loyalty of your allies.

FEATURES

  • Random events and generative enemies ensure each play-through will be unique
  • Roll your character's attributes or choose from 5 templates, such as the Magus, each with their own strengths and weaknesses
  • Handle challenges with your own play style; direct confrontation is not the only way to get things done!
  • Mods Using a deep but simple to understand data system, modders can easily create their own events and storylines.

content_descriptors.notes: Events may contain mild descriptions of violence, drug, and/or alcohol use.

name: Arcana Noir

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10/7/8/8.1/XP/Vista (32 or 64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.4ghz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 260 GTS or Radeon HD 4850 - 512 MB of VRAM or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 10/7/8/8.1 (64bit)
  • Processor: 2.66GHz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 460 GTX / Radeon 5770 - 1 GB of VRAM or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Arcana Noir is an illustrated text-based Rogue-lite RPG using a D100 system, resource management, and decision trees inspired by adventure games and interactive fiction.
